title: Poro King...
body:
Never playing it again.

Why?

Cause the first time I queue'd I got some asshole who fed 16 deaths because "it's a 4v5" and wanted them to win.

Then when I called them on it they were a toxic piece of shit.

replies.body: Man I hope your first romantic encounter goes PERFECTLY then.

> [{quoted}](name=Chamuel85,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EQnU7axR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-04T22:32:40.293+0000)
>
> Man I hope your first romantic encounter goes PERFECTLY then.

Yeah... cause I picked some complete asshole stranger that completely ruined it for me... 

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Don't go on blind dates then.

You win some, you lose some.
It's like ARAM, it's a flip of the coin what you'll get.

But don't let one feeding idiot ruin it for you, report and give it another go!
I've had plenty feeders before, mostly "it's just ___", so I get your frustration.

It's really not a bad gamemode, I enjoy it! Give it another go c:
Personally I'd rather aram because my teammates don't get to chose their champions. At least then you'll have a 50% chance you'll have a balanced team comp instead of LOPK's 1%.

> [{quoted}](name=Teapup,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EQnU7axR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-04T22:37:04.969+0000)
>
> You win some, you lose some.
> It's like ARAM, it's a flip of the coin what you'll get.
> 
> But don't let one feeding idiot ruin it for you, report and give it another go!
> I've had plenty feeders before, mostly "it's just ___", so I get your frustration.
> 
> It's really not a bad gamemode, I enjoy it! Give it another go c:

I completely understand I don't always win. This one feeding idiot ruined the game mode completely for me. Maybe I'll try it again next year. But no FUCKING WAY I'm subjecting myself to that shit again. Not without knowing 100% that this person is banned right now.

Hey that's okay!
I just don't want to see someone get pushed away from something because of one guy!
